
#### DATASET

library(plotly)
data("airquality")
head(airquality)


#### SIMPLE PLOT

plot_ly(airquality, x = ~ Temp, y = ~ Ozone, type = "scatter", color = ~ factor(Month))

#### PLOT WITH SIZES

plot_ly(airquality, x = ~ Temp, y = ~ Ozone, type = "scatter", color = ~ factor(Month), size = ~Solar.R)
